Political media expert and columnist John Bishop dies after brain aneurysm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/political-media-expert-and-columnist-john-bishop-dies-after-brain-aneurysm/J35LE72FRNCTJJZQJOXIPPLB34/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/political-media-expert-and-columnist-john-bishop-dies-after-brain-aneurysm/J35LE72FRNCTJJZQJOXIPPLB34/ The father of National MP Chris Bishop passed on Friday after a brain aneurysm. Sat, 14 Sep 2024 18:07:00 +0000 A court has found a man put his family home in a trust to prevent his new partner from being able to claim a share of it if the relationship ended. They separated after 10 years together. Photo / 123rf
